name: A Siren Of Symphonies
description:
Your in a strange world where people can be manipulated and controlled by songs.

This is the work of a monstrous creature that holds no remorse for people.

A Siren Of Symphonies is a fantasy RPG in which you can fight enemies, learn spells and find unique encounters.

Currently this is a early version of the game for testing purposes so feel free to leave any advice in the comments!
